segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward in this line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, basin full, water starting to spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming beneath her, soaking the apron area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open on the left, cookie jar prominent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's legs are uneven, tilting back slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate and dipping into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's positioned to catch whatever he tosses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window frames a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup screams domestic routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the hidden dangers stand out to me.
segments.speaker: PAR
